name: Washington State University Veterinary Teaching Hospital
services: 24/7 Emergency and Critical Care for all animals, including wildlife
notes: Located in Pullman. Advise callers to phone ahead, especially for wildlife, to ensure they are prepared for the animal's arrival.

name: WDFW Eastern Region (Region 1) Office
notes: For wildlife emergencies outside of business hours, callers should contact the WDFW Enforcement dispatch or 911.

name: WDFW North Central Region (Region 2) Office
notes: For wildlife emergencies outside of business hours, callers should contact the WDFW Enforcement dispatch or 911.

name: WDFW Enforcement Dispatch
services: Reporting poaching or dangerous wildlife encounters after hours.
notes: This is for non-emergency reporting. For immediate danger, call 911.

name: Central Washington Wildlife Hospital
notes: Located near Ellensburg. Specializes in wildlife.

name: Blue Mountain Wildlife
notes: Located in Pendleton, OR, but serves SE Washington. Primarily for birds of prey.

name: Spokane County Regional Animal Protection Service (SCRAPS)
hours: Varies, check website. Field operations are 24/7 for emergencies.
notes: Primarily handles domestic animals. Not equipped for most wildlife but can be a point of contact.

name: Wenatchee Valley Humane Society
notes: May be able to assist with or direct calls for certain small mammals or birds.

name: Okanogan County Animal Control
notes: Part of the Sheriff's office. For domestic animal issues.

name: Grant County Animal Outreach
notes: Focus on domestic pets. May be a point of contact for local resources.

name: Adams County Pet Rescue
notes: Focus on domestic pets.

name: Whitman County Humane Society
notes: Focus on domestic pets.

name: Pontarosa Veterinary Clinic
hours: Mon-Fri, 8 AM - 5:30 PM; Sat, 8 AM - 12 PM
notes: Located in Colville. Can stabilize wildlife before transfer.

name: Hunter Veterinary Clinic
notes: Located in Hunter, WA. May be able to assist with initial wildlife care.

name: Chewelah Veterinary Clinic
notes: General veterinary services.

name: Ferry County Veterinary Clinic
notes: Located in Republic.

name: Newport Veterinary Hospital
notes: Located in Newport.

name: Lincoln County Animal Control (Sheriff's Office)
notes: Contact Sheriff's office for animal control issues.

name: Garfield County Sheriff's Office
notes: Contact Sheriff's office for animal control issues.

name: Columbia County Sheriff's Office
notes: Contact Sheriff's office for animal control issues.

name: Walla Walla County Sheriff's Office
notes: Contact Sheriff's office for animal control issues.

name: Asotin County Animal Shelter
notes: Located in Clarkston.

name: Washington State Patrol (Dispatch)
notes: For use in emergencies, especially involving large animals on major roadways that pose a public safety risk.

name: Pet Emergency Clinic & Referral Center
notes: Primarily for domestic animals, but may be able to stabilize wildlife in a critical emergency before transfer to WSU or another rehabber.

name: Alpine Veterinary Clinic
notes: Located in Cheney.

name: Medical Lake Veterinary Hospital
notes: Located in Medical Lake.
